Params: {3: 'Awakening from a blinding light, Lucia finds herself back in the underground tunnel of Constellia.'}
{3: 'Nearby, the petite doll is intently operating a device almost as tall as herself.'}
{3: "She silently points to the force field at the room's edge, beyond which numerous Hetero-Creatures roam."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Is this device generating the force field? Wasn't it something Vonnegut created?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The doll shakes her head, then nods.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'What do you mean? Are you trying to say "not just that"?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She nods, keeping her head down in silence.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Can't you just speak? This is frustrating.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Lucia can't hide the irritation between her brows."}
{2: 'Chaos', 3: '...BPL-01, except for matters concerning your Commandant, I have nothing... to say to you.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'At the mention of the frame number she shares with Alpha, Lucia lets out a cold, derisive laugh.'}
{3: "Lucia tightens her grip on her Pyro Katana and takes a menacing step toward the Hetero-Creature's fragile figure."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'What actually happened that time? Why did Commandant come back to the Inver-Hetero Tower with you and order me to assist Vonnegut?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She must gather as much intelligence as possible, eliminating any potential oversights.'}
{3: 'The doll slightly raises her head, her lifeless eyes staring ahead.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Vonnegut looked at you when he mentioned it. Tell me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaos', 3: 'Cradle took that person out of the Hetero Tower.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chaos', 3: "After that... it was similar to Constellia's situation... After the Inver-Hetero Tower appeared again, many rifts showed up across the world.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chaos', 3: 'Just as how the Red Tide surged into Constellia from underground, those rifts brought the Red Tide to other places as well.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chaos', 3: 'I wanted to... to bring that commandant back to the Inver-Hetero Tower, but instead saw an endless cycle of death.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'After a long silence, the doll decides to cut out a piece of Punishing-made tissue from her chest and tosses it to Lucia from a distance.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'You want me to see it for myself?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaos', 3: '...You should be able to see some of it.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Lucia silently gazes at the Hetero-Creature tissue in her hand for a moment before finally crushing it in her palm.'}
{3: "The Phantom Tracer activates at its user's command, unveiling the memories stored within the tissue one by one."}
{3: "Through Chaos' perspective in the memory data, Lucia sees Cradle trailing behind."}
{2: "It feels like we've been here forever...", 3: '73'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Yeah... Once we're back, I'll make sure you get a few days of proper rest.", 4: '11'}
{3: 'At that moment, Lucia failed to notice Cradle lurking among the Hetero-Creatures.'}
{3: 'She never even noticed when Cradle made her move.'}
{3: 'Was it because Cradle used her familiarity with her own territory to prepare everything far too perfectly?'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Whatever the case... when Lucia turned around, there was no one behind her anymore.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Unlike Lucia who doubled back to search, Chaos spotted the traces left behind by the red butterflies.'}
{3: 'She realized that Cradle planned to use this irreversible separation as a chance to permanently eliminate the commandant, ensuring Vonnegut could never complete Chaos.'}
{3: "Though she disagreed with Vonnegut's plans, she didn't want the commandant to die here either."}
{3: 'And so, Chaos rushed forward in pursuit.'}
{3: 'Stepped into the chaotic, never-ending cycle of death.'}
